channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stocks drop as Nvidia slides and the fog of Trump's trade war thickens
item.description: The S&P 500 sank 2.2% after falling as much as 3.3% earlier. Such an amount would have vied for one of its worst losses in years before the historic s...

item.title: As Trump's trade war continues, Canadian businesses evaluate relationship with U.S.
item.description: The trade war the U.S. is waging with countries around the world could reshape the global economy. NPR's Planet Money brings a dispatch from Canada.

item.title: Tariffs make sour grapes for American winemakers
item.description: American winemakers tell us why tariffs hurt their industry.

item.title: Stem cells to treat Parkinson's? Two small studies hint at success
item.description: Two new studies suggest that Parkinson's disease can potentially be treated with stem cells placed in a patient's brain.

item.title: Smashing, the reading curation app by Goodreads’ founder, shuts down

item.title: How war, money and the quest for discovery entwined the US government and universities
item.description: The showdown between the Trump administration and Harvard University is spotlighting bare-knuckled politics and big dollar figures.
